price: 131. Sidaasi waa inaan Rabbigaa ku halligeyn magaalooyinka gar darro iyagoo dadkooda war la’ yihiin (aan loo digin).
arabic: ذَٰلِكَ أَن لَّمۡ يَكُن رَّبُّكَ مُهۡلِكَ ٱلۡقُرَىٰ بِظُلۡمٖ وَأَهۡلُهَا غَٰفِلُونَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: dhālika an lam yakun rabbuka muh'lika al-qurā biẓul'min wa-ahluhā ghāfilūna
